Auctions, Liquidations and Buying & Selling of Equipment:

Our group meticulously evaluates each project and the client’s needs, then develops and executes the optimum marketing and sale scenario to achieve highest returns. Appraisal Services:

Our appraisers perform properly researched 'gross & net' Forced Liquidation (FL), Orderly Liquidation (OL) and Fair Market Value (FMV) appraisals which adhere to USPAP (Uniform Standards of Professional Appraisal Practice). Also, based on the project, We can perform 'Desk Top', non- inspected appraisals.
